title: Job Openings at Dreamcity Property & Investment Limited
content:
Dreamcity Property & Investment Limited remains at vanguard of residential and commercial real estate development across major cities in Nigeria, delivering reliable residential structures with quality infrastructures, luxury apartments in highbrow cities and commercials real estate with good returns for our investors, whom have overtime become part of our success story.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Projects Supervisor

Job Locations: Jabi - Abuja (FCT) & Victoria Island - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are currently seeking a highly competent and experienced project supervisor to join our team.
	As a project supervisor, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful execution of assigned projects, ensuring adherence to quality standards, and coordinating the activities of site engineers.


Roles and Responsibilities


	Take charge of all engineering construction activities on assigned projects, ensuring adherence to project timelines and quality standards.
	Coordinate and supervise the activities of site engineers to ensure efficient project execution.
	Work closely with the company's executive assistant and external structural/quality control team (consultants) to ensure conformity with company standards and offerings to our subscribers.
	Implement the company's construction policy and ensure that project designs align with the company's standards.
	Ensure site engineers are well-informed and equipped to carry out their responsibilities effectively.
	Monitor and coordinate their activities to guarantee the successful implementation of projects in line with construction policy documents and checklists.
	Ensure that construction works align with project designs and are free from errors or inconsistencies.
	Implement the company's project checklist to maintain quality assurance throughout the construction process.
	Optimize the utilization of financial resources and materials allocated for site use.
	Take responsibility for minimizing wastage on-site and be held accountable for resource management.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess HND / Bachelor's Degree; Architecture is preferable.
	Minimum of 7 years of relevant experience in project supervision within the construction industry.
	Relevant educational qualifications in engineering or a related field.
	Professional certification, including COREN, NSE, or equivalent, is required.
	Familiarity with construction standards and best practices.
	Strong organizational and leadership skills to effectively coordinate site engineers and monitor project progress.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with internal and external stakeholders.
	Proficiency in project management software and tools.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet project deadlines.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment.office@dreamcityproperty.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further assessment.

 

 

2.) Business Development Manager

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Onsite)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Business Development Manager for our estate industry with the ability to drive business development, marketing, and sales initiatives.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for handling statutory and regulatory compliance, strategic planning, and fostering key client relationships. The role requires a minimum of 5 years of relevant experience and educational qualifications in Business Management or a related field.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement strategic business development plans to drive growth and expansion.
	Lead marketing and sales efforts to attract new clients and maintain existing relationships.
	Ensure compliance with statutory and regulatory requirements in the estate industry.
	Identify new business opportunities and market trends to capitalize on market potential.
	Collaborate with internal teams to optimize business processes and enhance operational efficiency.
	Conduct market research and analysis to identify competitive advantages and positioning.
	Prepare and present business proposals, reports, and presentations to stakeholders.
	Manage and mentor a team of business development professionals to achieve targets.
	Monitor industry developments, competitor activities, and customer feedback to inform business strategies.
	Establish and maintain strong partnerships with key stakeholders, clients, and industry associations.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Marketing, or a related field; Master's degree preferred.
	Proven track record of at least 5 years in business development, marketing, and sales in the estate industry.
	Strategic thinker with the ability to analyze market trends and develop innovative business strategies.
	Leadership qualities with experience in managing and motivating teams.
	Strong understanding of statutory and regulatory compliance requirements in the real estate sector.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in CRM software, MS Office suite, and other business development tools.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: recruitment.office@dreamcityproperty.com using the Job Position and Job Location as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further assessment.

 

 

3.) Executive Assistant to MD & Business Development Officer

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time& Onsite

Job Summary


	We seek a highly organized, strategic professional to support our Managing Director while driving business growth in the dynamic real estate sector.
	This dual-focus role combines executive-level administrationwith proactive business development, ideal for a candidate who thrives in fast-paced environments and possesses deep real estate market expertise.


Responsibilities


	Manage the MD’s calendar, correspondence, travel, and meetings with precision.
	Act as a bridge between the MD and internal/external stakeholders (investors, partners, board members).
	Handle sensitive information, reports, and communications with utmost discretion.
	Prepare agendas, documents, and minutes for executive meetings; track action items.
	Assist the MD in provide oversight and monitoring high-priority real estate projects and initiatives.
	Identify new real estate opportunities (land acquisition, off-plan projects, joint ventures).
	Generate leads, nurture relationships with investors/developers, and close deals.
	Create pitches, presentations, and proposals for strategic partnerships.
	Represent the company at events; build relationships with brokers, agencies, and institutional clients.
	Track BD metrics (pipeline, conversion rates) and report directly to the MD.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Real Estate, Finance, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years in real estate business development AND/OR executive support (C-suite level).
	Proven understanding of real estate transactions, market trends, and regulatory frameworks.
	Elite verbal/written English skills; proficiency in other languages is a plus.
	Advanced MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint), CRM software (e.g., Salesforce), and project management tools.
	Exceptional multitasking, problem-solving, and negotiation abilities.
	Experience as an Executive Assistant to an MD/CEO.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment.office@dreamcityproperty.com using the Job Position and Job Location as the subject of the mail.

Social Media Manager (Sports Website) Job at Lah Creative




        
    

        
        Lah Creative is a recruiting agency for a renowned sport websites with traffic ranging from2-10 million monthly per month. We source and get resourceful writers who can entertain, and info audience around globe with great content that will bring them back to the site. Our clients are all over of the globe working remotely to acheive various media objectives while also ensuring proper welfare and career growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager (Sports Website)
Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop and execute social media strategies to grow the brand’s online presence and engage sports fans across platforms (Instagram, Twitter/X, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, etc.)
	Create, curate, and schedule compelling content including match highlights, breaking news, memes, live updates, athlete features, and fan interactions.
	Manage real-time coverage of live sporting events, providing updates, commentary, and engagement with followers.
	Monitor sports trends, hashtags, and conversations to keep content relevant and timely.
	Collaborate with content writers, graphic designers, and video editors to produce visually engaging and informative posts.
	Analyze social media performance using analytics tools and provide regular reports to guide content and engagement strategies.
	Respond promptly to fan comments, messages, and mentions to build a strong community and maintain a positive brand image.
	Coordinate with marketing and editorial teams to align campaigns and promotions with overall brand goals.
	Stay informed on platform algorithm changes, best practices, and innovations to maximize reach and engagement.
	Develop partnerships with influencers, sports personalities, and fan communities to expand audience reach.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc. Degree in any relevant field with 2 - 5 years of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume, cover letter, and portfolio (including links to their online portfolio or relevant work samples) to: lahcontent@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
